item.title: Optimised Topology
item.description: This guide will explain the concept of 3D model topology, why it is important and how to optimise your model for real-time applications such as video games.

item.title: Useful Videos
item.description: Comprehensive Complete Beginner’s Guide (YouTube) A complete guide like this will take you through making a simple scene and teach the basics of modelling, texturing and shading, but will not teach techniques specific to making game assets.

item.title: Exporting to Unity
item.description: In Unity Before you start, it is good practice to make a folder for your model imports if you do not have one already (see Best practices for organizing your Unity project) In Blender Recommended: Join objects into one mesh (select all then Ctrl+J) unless you need it for rigging etc.
